parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A tent, tabernacle; fig: of the human body. From skene; a hut or temporary residence, i.e. the human body.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To groan, expressing grief, anger, or desire. From stenos; to make in straits, i.e. to sigh, murmur, pray inaudibly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To weight, load, burden, lit. and met. From barus; to weigh down.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
From ek and the base of duno; to cause to sink out of, i.e. to divest.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
To have on over (as a garment); mid: I put on myself in addition. Middle voice from epi and enduo; to invest upon oneself.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Mortal, subject to death. From thnesko; liable to die.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To drink down, swallow, devour, destroy, consume. From kata and pino; to drink down, i.e. Gulp entire.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
